short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension communicates between the Chrome browser and the Windows bookmark manager Linkman.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension gives you the ability to work with the Windows bookmark manager Linkman directly from your Chrome browser. You can add new bookmarks from Chrome to Linkman and also search for bookmarks in Linkman. Please keep in mind that you need to install the Windows Linkman application, before installing the Linkman Chrome (http://www.outertech.com/en/bookmark-manager). You can see a tutorial for Linkman on youtube: http://www.youtube.com/v/K9k-wVDwYtw?vq=hd1080
